pullRequest.title: screenmarker: add ability to put screen markers around widgets
pullRequest.bodyText:
Gives you the ability to put the screen marker around a widget by clicking on the said widget.
Supersedes/Closes #3952

beforeCommit.message:
screenmarker: add ability to attach screen markers to widgets
Gives you the ability to put the screen marker around a widget by clicking on the said widget

Co-authored-by: melkypie <5113962+melkypie@users.noreply.github.com>

afterCommit.message:
screenmarker: add ability to put screen markers around widgets
Gives you the ability to put the screen marker around a widget by clicking on the said widget

Co-authored-by: melkypie <5113962+melkypie@users.noreply.github.com>

beforeCommit.message:
screenmarker: add ability to put screen markers around widgets

afterCommit.message:
screenmarker: add ability to put screen markers around widgets
Gives you the ability to put a screen marker around a widget that has a menu option attached to it

Co-authored-by: Jasper Ketelaar <Jasperketelaar@kpnmail.nl>

nodes.bodyText: We usually (or always) use Overlay in overlay names
final, and just pass widget.getChild(param0) to drawHighlight directly
This is literally same method as startCreation(Point location)
